.class nested public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SimpleAdapter/IViewBinder implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type SimpleAdapter.IViewBinder = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: This class can be used by external clients of SimpleAdapter to bind values to views.

remarks.para: This class can be used by external clients of SimpleAdapter to bind values to views.
You should use this class to bind values to views that are not directly supported by SimpleAdapter or to change the way binding occurs for views supported by SimpleAdapter.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: the view to bind the data to
the data to bind to the view
a safe String representation of the supplied data: it is either the result of data.toString() or an empty String but it is never null
Docs.summary: Binds the specified data to the specified view.
Docs.returns: true if the data was bound to the view, false otherwise

remarks.para: Binds the specified data to the specified view.
When binding is handled by this ViewBinder, this method must return true. If this method returns false, SimpleAdapter will attempts to handle the binding on its own.
